website_summaries.verdict: If you like bold colors, this snowboarding jacket will turn heads while keeping you warm in the snowdrifts.
pros: Keeps wearers warm and dry in wintry conditions, yet has venting that adds to comfort if it gets too hot
Polyester and fleece lining is soft and comfortable
Ample pockets for stashing small gear
cons: The colorful look is a plus for customers who like an edgy style, but it won't appeal to everyone
Sizes run large for some wearers

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for skiing
customer_reviews.text: Bought this coat going to Keystone Colorado and I could not be happier with this purchase. It blocks wind well and roomy enough for layering. I initially ordered a small but exchanged it for medium to be able to layer -I am 5'7 and 138lbs. I love all the pockets that are on this jacket. I get so many compliments on to whenever I wear it. I definitely recommend this coat. Much better quality than Eddie Bauer and cheaper:)
customer_reviews.author: Karolina

customer_reviews.title: Fun, warm and high quality
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is very cute and warm! I’m 5’2 and 130 lbs very fit with a large chest (32DD) so it was a little tight fitting in the chest area. I ordered a medium and could of probably used a large. As long as I’m not layering it fits comfortably. It is a very warm cozy jacket so I don’t think there will be a need for layering either. I love the colors and the fur hood. Very great quality, I bought to use snowboarding.
customer_reviews.author: K8LYN

customer_reviews.title: Super cute for skiing!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a new ski jacket that wouldn't break the bank and is still cute and functional, and this is it! Despite the low price, this coat has all the bells and whistles - fitted wrist bands with a thumb hole, waist garter to keep snow out of your coat if you fall skiing. I usually wear a 10 so I ordered a Large but it's a little big. In hindsight I should have stuck to the size chart a little closer and ordered a Medium. I'm not going to return it because I'll just layer underneath anyway, but be forewarned.

product_meta.title: APTRO Women's Insulated Windproof Waterproof Ski & Snowboarding Jacket
feature_bullets: ①Microporous Membrane: Adopted latest 3D high performance waterproof fabrics, it can evaporates the sweat from your body easily and obtain the effect of enduring waterproof windproof and highly breathable. All seams thorough adhesive treatment, the adhesive is smooth and tight to lock every pinhole effectively prevent rainwater from seeping through the seam.

②INSULATION JACKET: Synthetic Insulation Jacket with 250g Insulation Filler are Ideal for snow outerwear or More Frigid Conditions Like cold, humid, and rainy. Unique Cuts Down on Weight and Bulk without Affecting the overall Warmth of the Jacket to Make It Lighter-weight.

③Design Concept: A professional coloreful waterproof ski jacket bring you a energy and passional feeling that can add glamour for your skiing and a visible sign for other skiers. Draping Cutting and Relax Fit bring a freely movement experience.

④Features: 2 slant pockets, 1 inner mesh pocket for your ski goggles, 1 inner zipper pocket, 1 left arm zipper pocket, zipper closed mesh lined venting under oxter, adjustable cuffs, stretchable glove with thumb hole, quality zipper, inside windproof snap powder skirt, Internal Drawcord Hem.
⑤OCCASIONS: Downhill Skiing, Hiking, Mountaineering, Camping, Snowboarding, Snow Sports and other winter outdoor activities.
